author: Michael Cripe
description: Former Dragon Age series executive producer Mark Darrah says he doesn’t feel EA and BioWare efficiently supported his team during the early development of Dragon Age: The Veilguard.
title: Former BioWare Lead Says Dragon Age: The Veilguard Team was 'Jerked Around' Due to EA's Disinterest in the Franchise

author: Chris Reed
description: If you like video games, you're going to love these board games, based on some of the best and most popular video games around.
title: 12 Board Games Based on Video Games That Are Actually Worth Playing

author: Michael Cripe
description: The Pointer Sisters’ Hot Together has seen a monumental increase in Spotify streams following its use in the new Grand Theft Auto 6 trailer, which premiered just yesterday.
title: GTA 6 Trailer 2 Delivers Massive Spotify Boost to The Pointer Sisters' Hot Together

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Is GTA 6 too good to be true? Some cast doubt on the small print at the end of Trailer 2 that said it was captured on PS5, suggesting the footage came from either a PS5 Pro or a PC. Not so, according to Rockstar. Not only that, but the trailer has gameplay.
title: After Some Said GTA 6 Trailer 2 Looked Too Good to Have Been Captured on a Base PS5, Rockstar Confirms It Really Was — and There’s Even Gameplay in There

author: Myles Obenza
description: Savings upon savings.
title: The Lord of the Rings Illustrated Edition Is Part of Amazon's Buy One, Get One 50% Off Book Sale

author: Matthew Adler
description: Harmonies delivers a satisfying blend of drafting and spatial puzzle-solving wrapped in a beautifully designed package. It’s approachable for new players but has enough depth to keep seasoned gamers coming back.
title: Harmonies Board Game Review

author: Chris Reed
description: Everything you need to know to preorder Bravely Default: Flying Fairy HD Remaster, including where it's available, how much it costs, what comes in the box, and more.
title: Bravely Default: Flying Fairy HD Remaster Is Up for Preorder for Nintendo Switch 2

author: coreydemoss
title: Nikoderiko: The Magical World - Director’s Cut Released as Free Upgrade

author: Michael Cripe
description: Developer Sandfall Interactive has announced that the Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 soundtrack has managed to top Billboard album charts in the weeks since its release.
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 Success Continues as Its Soundtrack Tops Billboard Classical Music Album Charts

author: Lex Briscuso
description: The road from page to small screen for Daredevil: Born Again was rife with tweaks and rewrites, but it turns out the series that made it to air ultimately had one episode left untouched: Episode 5, the one that, believe it or not, just so happens to be star Charlie Cox’s “least favorite” of the entire season.
title: Charlie Cox Reveals His 'Least Favorite' Episode of Daredevil: Born Again: 'I Pushed Back Against It'

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Following the euphoric reception to the return of Verdansk to Call of Duty battle royale Warzone, familiar complaints have begun to resurface, chief among them cheating. Now, Activision has outlined the work it's done to combat the issue, and revealed what steps it's taking in the future.
title: As Call of Duty: Warzone Cheating Complaints Ramp Up Following the Return of Verdansk, Activision Insists It’s Caused ‘Chaos’ in the Cheat Marketplace by ‘Disrupting’ Over 150 Cheat Resellers

author: Eric Song
description: Includes a copy of Doom: The Dark Ages.
title: The Gigabyte GeForce RTX 5070 Graphics Card Is in Stock at MSRP for Amazon Prime Members

author: Michael Cripe
description: The Nintendo Switch 2 launches in less than one month, so you should know that it may use some of its new features to record your audio and video chat sessions.
title: Nintendo Privacy Policy Update Says Switch 2 'May' Monitor and Record Audio and Video Chat Sessions — With Your Consent

description: The perfect way to fill your shelves.
title: Amazon Has a Huge Buy One, Get One 50% Off Sale on Popular Books Ahead of Mother's Day

description: Triples your Nintendo Switch or iPhone 16 battery life.

description: More than two decades after its original run, Dragon Ball Z remains one of the most beloved anime series of all time. Let's count down the show's 13 best characters, from Frieza to Vegeta to Goku.

author: Mitchell Saltzman
description: Elden Ring Nightreign's Raider class might be the best one yet. Check out our hands-on impressions of this offensive powerhouse as our IGN First coverage of Elden Ring Nightreign continues on all throughout the month of May.
title: Elden Ring Nightreign - Raider Class Hands-On Impressions - IGN First

author: George Nash
title: Five Things to Know to Prepare You For Empyreal

author: Lex Briscuso
description: Edward Berger’s sensational papal thriller Conclave took moviegoers by storm last year, showing a side of Catholicism that most people simply have never been exposed to: the ritualistic election of a sitting pope. Now that Cardinals from around the world are about to participate in an actual conclave for real, it seems as though the power of film is on full display... because some of the real life religious leaders who will participate have looked to the film for guidance.
title: Conclave Is Being Watched By Cardinals As Research For the Upcoming Real Conclave

author: Jim Vejvoda
description: Lionsgate debuted the first trailer today for The Long Walk, an upcoming survival thriller directed by Hunger Games franchise veteran Francis Lawrence and based on the first novel written by Stephen King (under his then-pseudonym Richard Bachman).
title: The Long Walk Director on Casting Mark Hamill as a Stephen King Villain

author: Michael Higham
description: The Asus ROG Flow Z13 is the gaming tablet evolved. If you can stomach the sticker shock, you’ll find uniquely impressive gaming performance and versatility.
title: The New Asus ROG Flow Z13 Redefines Gaming on a 2-in-1 Laptop-Tablet

author: Adam Bankhurst
description: Disney has announced that it will officially be opening its seventh theme park and resort in Abu Dhabi on the waterfront of Yas Island with the help of Miral.
title: Disney Announces It Will Open Its Seventh Theme Park in Abu Dhabi With Miral on Yas Island

author: Hannah Hoolihan
description: May's Humble Choice lineup features The Thaumaturge, Amnesia: The Bunker, and more. Sign up today for $11.99.
title: The Thaumaturge, Amnesia: The Bunker, and Evil West Lead May’s Humble Choice

author: Lex Briscuso
description: Marvel Studios recently revealed a whole new side of Thunderbolts*, the one that comes after that asterisk — and now, it's doubled down on what it started and brought it into the social media world.
title: Marvel's Thunderbolts* Marketing Push Continues as Dispute Between Sam Wilson's Avengers and the New Avengers Is Dragged Into the Real World

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: For now, EVE Vanguard is still a lot of "wills," "shoulds," and " hope tos." It is playable, and the gunplay feels a bit unpolished still, but satisfying. The environments are impressive, and the weapon designs are diverse and bombastic. It's just hard to get the full picture without actually experiencing how it will tie into the EVE Online shared universe or the social features, which are definitely the most exciting part of the whole idea.
title: EVE Vanguard Makes A Lot of Big Promises, But Delivers Good Gunplay

author: Christian Wait
description: As of May 7, the Pokémon TCG: Temporal Forces Elite Trainer Box is available again at Amazon, while fans still chase the high-end TCG Classic Box.
title: Pokémon TCG: Temporal Forces Elite Trainer Box Finally Back In Stock at Amazon

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Genshin Impact now reveals how much you need to spend to garantee pulling a character — and now players just want HoYoverse to sell the characters directly.
title: Genshin Impact Updates Shop to Show How Much You Need to Spend to Guarantee Pulling a Character — and Now Players Want HoYoverse to Sell the Characters Directly

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Following last month’s news that John Wick 5 is official and Keanu Reeves had signed on to “give John’s story the proper next step,” franchise director Chad Stahelski has begun to tease what fans can expect from the film — and it sounds like things are going to be different this time around.
title: John Wick 5 Will Be ‘Really Different,’ Director Chad Stahelski Teases Following Keanu Reeves Confirmation

author: Vikki Blake
description: Publisher/ developer EA has confirmed it has no plans to raise the price of its games even as the likes of Microsoft and Nintendo jump to $80.

description: GTA 6 Trailer 2 is packed full of details (we spotted 89!), but it has also sparked an explosion of fan theories as the community analyze each frame for clues on what to expect when the most anticipated game in the world eventually comes out in May 2026.
title: With GTA 6 Trailer 2 Out in the Wild, the Fan Theories Are Coming Thick and Fast — and Some Sound Pretty Plausible

description: Amazon UK now has preorders for the Fallout Season 1 4K UHD Steelbook Edition, which is sold out everywhere else.

description: As of May 7, the Pokémon TCG: Mimikyu ex Box is available for $49.99 at Amazon, LEGO Cherry Blossom is just $8.15 alongside a slew of other great LEGO deals, and top tech and game accessories are seeing price drops across retailers.
title: Best Deals Today: Pokémon Cards, LEGO Sets, and Everyday Essentials

author: Vikki Blake
description: Get ready, Guardian — Bungie just unveiled what's coming up in its sci-fi shooter, Destiny 2, including two new expansions and major seasonal and core game updates coming to both paying and free players, all badged under the "Year of Prophecy."
title: Destiny 2's Year of Prophecy: Here's Everything Guardians Need to Know

description: Will Street Fighter creator Takashi Nishiyama's new Saudi-backed boxing game pack a punch? Japanese fans react.
title: Will Street Fighter Creator’s New Saudi-Backed Boxing Game Pack a Punch? Japanese Fans React

description: Hazelight's fan-favorite co-op adventure, Split Fiction, has sold almost four million copies. Publisher EA has called it a "hugely successful launch."
title: Boundary-Pushing Co-op Adventure Split Fiction nears 4 million sales

description: The entire Final Fantasy VII Remake Trilogy will eventually be released on Nintendo Switch 2, a Square Enix developer has revealed.
title: Entire Final Fantasy VII Remake Trilogy Coming to Nintendo Switch 2, Square Enix Developer Reveals

author: Lex Briscuso
description: Thunderbolts* finally started gracing screens nationwide this past weekend — but Marvel also pulled a rather interesting stunt in the wake of its opening. Marvel unveiled a new title, or at the very least a subtitle, for the film just days after the release that, in many fans’ eyes, spoils a key element of the movie.
title: Marvel's Thunderbolts 'Spoiler' Title Change Just a Week After Release Sparks Mixed Feelings From Fans

author: Erik Adams
description: Though it starts out as a promising slasher throwback, Clown in a Cornfield struggles with a jokey tone and a political message that lacks teeth.
title: Clown in a Cornfield Review

author: Adam Mathew
description: Whether you're on the hunt for sprawling RPGs, nostalgic remakes, or something stylish and brand new, there’s a little something tucked into each platform’s treasure chest.
title: AU Deals: Heavy Discounts on FromSoftware GOATs, Sucker Punch Samurai-fests, Mafias, and More!

description: In this high-water mark for the high-water mark of modern Star Wars, it’s too late for anything else to be done.
